doc.title: Dodgy Peter's Burg
doc.plot: 300 years after the foundation of St. Petersburg, the spirit of Peter the Great is still wandering through the streets and backyards of the town. Directly affecting the new decadent lifestyle of its inhabitants, some prostrated by poverty, and some stratified in a novij Russkij enthusiastic artificial atmosphere, Peter himself becomes a "dodgy one". Gathering up the broken pieces of a dead mirror, Peter, encounters desperate reflections of the former glorious town he had founded.
